## BootComponent.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `BootComponent` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(app: Application);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  app | [Application](./core.application.md) | Application instance |
